verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the second sabbath after the <S%G1207>first,<s%> <S%G4521><s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1279>went<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> corn <S%G4702>fields;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5089>plucked<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> ears of <S%G4719>corn,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> did <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G5597>rubbing<s%> them in their <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> ye that <S%G3739>which<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>days<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Have ye not read so much as <S%G3761><s%> <S%G314><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G3698>when<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> was <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they which <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

How <S%G5613><s%> he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> did <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> shewbread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> that were <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> for <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> alone? <S%G3441><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath,<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3584>withered.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2147>find<s%> an <S%G2724>accusation<s%> against <S%G846>him.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3584>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> Rise <S%G1453>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> stand <S%G2476>forth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> midst. <S%G3319><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%> and stood <S%G2476>forth.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> I will <S%G1905>ask<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> one <S%G5101>thing;<s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>days<s%> to do <S%G15>good,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to do <S%G2554>evil?<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> it?

And <S%G2532><s%> looking round about <S%G4017>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> Stretch <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3779>so:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G243>other.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G454>madness;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1255>communed<s%> one with <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> they might <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G302><s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> that he went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> continued all <S%G2258>night<s%> <S%G1273><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G4377>called<s%> unto him <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> he <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G652>apostles;<s%>

Simon, <S%G4613><s%> <S%G3739>(whom<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,)<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G918>Bartholomew,<s%>

Matthew <S%G3156><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2208>Zelotes,<s%>
And <S%G2455>Judas<s%> the brother of <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> the <S%G4273>traitor.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G3977>plain,<s%> <S%G5117><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>company<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G2992>people<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G3588>the<s%> sea <S%G3882>coast<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3554>diseases;<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they that were <S%G3791>vexed<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G2323>healed.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> there went virtue <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1411><s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2390>healed<s%> them <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> be ye poor: <S%G4434><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G5212>yours<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are ye that <S%G3983>hunger<s%> now: <S%G3568><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> ye shall be <S%G5526>filled.<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are ye that <S%G2799>weep<s%> now: <S%G3568><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> ye shall laugh. <S%G1070><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> ye, <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G3404>hate<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall <S%G873>separate<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> from their company, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3679>reproach<s%> you, <S%G2532>and<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> for the Son of man's sake. <S%G1752><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> <S%G444><s%>

Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> ye <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> leap for joy: <S%G4640><s%> <S%G1063>for,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> is <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in the like manner <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5024><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
But <S%G4133><s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> that are <S%G4145>rich!<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> ye have <S%G568>received<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> consolation. <S%G3874><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> that are <S%G1705>full<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> ye shall <S%G3983>hunger.<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> that <S%G1070>laugh<s%> <S%G3568>now!<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> ye shall <S%G3996>mourn<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> weep. <S%G2799><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G2036>speak<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> of <S%G5209>you!<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> so <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5024><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> false prophets. <S%G5578><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> which <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G25>Love<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>good<s%> to them which <S%G3404>hate<s%> you, <S%G5209><s%>
Bless <S%G2127><s%> them that <S%G2672>curse<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> them which despitefully <S%G1908>use<s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

And unto him that <S%G5180>smiteth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> one <S%G4600>cheek<s%> <S%G3930>offer<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G243>other;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> him that taketh <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2440>cloak<s%> <S%G2967>forbid<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to take thy <S%G5509>coat<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G154>asketh<s%> of <S%G4571>thee;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> him that taketh <S%G142>away<s%> thy <S%G4674>goods<s%> ask them not again. <S%G523><s%> <S%G3361><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> should <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G25>love<s%> them which <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5485>thank<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G5213>ye?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> those that <S%G25>love<s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye do <S%G15>good<s%> to them which do <S%G15>good<s%> to <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5485>thank<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G5213>ye?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> same. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye <S%G1155>lend<s%> to them <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G618>receive,<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5485>thank<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G5213>ye?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1155>lend<s%> to <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G618>receive<s%> as much again. <S%G2470><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> <S%G25>love<s%> ye <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> do <S%G15>good,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1155>lend,<s%> hoping for nothing again; <S%G560><s%> <S%G3367><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4183>great,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G2071>be<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> Highest: <S%G5310><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5543>kind<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G884>unthankful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the evil. <S%G4190><s%>
Be <S%G1096><s%> ye <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3629>merciful,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> merciful. <S%G3629><s%>

Judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G3364>not<s%> be judged: <S%G2919><s%> <S%G2613>condemn<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G3364>not<s%> be condemned: <S%G2613><s%> <S%G630>forgive,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall be forgiven: <S%G630><s%>
